meta.name: description
meta.content: Award-winning public charter schools in Tucson and Phoenix Arizona. Serving grades K-8, tuition-free.

h2.a: COVID-19 Update For Our AMS Community

div.div: Access the latest news and resources from AMS.

div.a: Learn More About the COVID-19 Update For Our AMS Community

div.div: Your child is unique and we understand that choosing a school is an immensely personal decision. That is why we are open with families and transparent about our culture.
We also believe that AMS is one of the best school networks in Arizona, but don’t just take it from us.

div.a: Learn more about Why Parents Choose AMS >

div.strong: believes that smart students are well-rounded.

div.div: Founded in 2000, the story of AMS is what keeps us motivated to serve the parents, families, and children in our community with a well-rounded education.

div.strong: Through a well-rounded education, we transform today’s scholars into tomorrow’s global visionaries.

div.div: As a team, we equip motivated students in grades K-8 with a top-quality education, empowering them to succeed in both their academic and personal lives.

div.strong: We’re more than just numbers and our impact is more than lines on a graph.

div.div: Behind every data point is a motivated student, a dedicated family, and a passionate teacher. Every statistic is a story of hard work and endless love.
Through a well-rounded education, we transform today's scholars into tomorrow's global visionaries.
